ComicInfo.Title: Cobra Rising, Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cobra Rising, Part 2: Zartan visits Storm Shadow and gives him back the sword Evening Shade. Hawk confronts the Baroness in Malta. Sneak Peek meets the new Snake Eyes and empathizes with his situation.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 07:27:33. [CVDB497979] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:36:44. [Issue ID 1449180]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Elias Chatzoudis,James Brown (J. Brown),Paolo Villanelli,Robert Atkins,S.L. Gallant
